quotations: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.
In all planning, you make a list and you set priorities.
It takes as much energy to wish as it does to plan.
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
The shortest way to do many things is to only one thing at a time.
There's only one corner of the universe you can be sure of improving, and that's your own self.
